channel.title: House of Peregrine
channel.description: Recent content on House of Peregrine

item.title: It's Now.
item.description: “Bloom where you are planted.” It always hit out of nowhere when I received this as a response. It was 2015 and I was really not coping well with what I saw was a completely bizarre acceptance of normal life in the only place I had called home and wondered if I was the only one seeing it. I heard it over and over in different forms-a warning to keep my head down and feel grateful for all I have.

item.title: Membership
item.description: By invitation or nomination Genesis members are mercenaries in their pursuits and want to dive further into web3. Counted among us are artists, venture capitalists, parents & established executives across all industries and nations. 200 memberships @ .25 ETH By application or nomination. item.title: Web3
item.description: House of Peregrine Genesis Collectible We have an epic vision at House of Peregrine: to make living internationally more beautiful, connected and sustainable by uniting our global community of internationals in a new way. We believe in producing fewer, high-quality products uniquely curated and designed for and by our members. And we boldly believe that our community will play a critical role in shaping House of Peregrine’s future. Some call our vision —of building a business by growing a supportive community rather than just another blog or facebook group “too ambitious.
